rule: Company names must be listed in a comma-separated format following the label "Company names:".
input: Text: Our meeting with Tesla and Apple was insightful, but both Elon Musk and Tim Cook were skeptical about the blockchain, AI, and sustainability topics.
coverage:

validityText:

It includes names of companies like "Tesla" and "Apple", individuals like "Elon Musk" and "Tim Cook", and specific topics such as "blockchain", "AI", and "sustainability". The text input is in English and is comprehensible for accurate entity extraction. There is no restriction on length, and this input provides complete sentences.
